item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.3 We are happy to announce Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services v1.5.3! What’s changed? · Supports ODS export format. · Supports XLSB export format. · 11 fixes and enhancements.

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.2 We are happy to announce Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.2! What’s changed? Optimizes rendering for large data report. Fixes an installation issue for Windows 7. Resolves paging for Tablix report item. Handles rendering more groups for Tablix. Reduces memory use rate. Issues Resolved in Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.2. Issue ID Component Summary 16478 Server Component Problem in header row of matrix report after export in XLSX file 16170 Server Component Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.5.1 We are happy to announce Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services version 1.5.1! What’s changed? Enhances rendering of editable Charts for SQL Server Reporting Services 2008. Sets the Performance configuration as the default configuration.
